description:
I've talked about funding in the Linux world quite extensively and there are many different approaches to the problem but one that's interesting me is what Purism is doing with PureOS by providing an optional subscription model.

==========Support The Channel==========
► Patreon: https://brodierobertson.xyz/patreon
► Paypal: https://brodierobertson.xyz/paypal
► Liberapay: https://brodierobertson.xyz/liberapay
► Amazon USA: https://brodierobertson.xyz/amazonusa
